text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump What the fuck is trump & GOP doing? Confirmed COVID19 cases 277,593 (more than anywhere else in the world) and death toll 7000+ and rising & you sit on your hands & back his incompetent ass up! trump & the rest of you worthless minions own this.
